verses.verse: אַ֥שְֽׁרֵי־ <WH835> Blessed הָאִ֗ישׁ <WH376> [is] the man אֲשֶׁ֤ר ׀ <WH834> who לֹ֥א <WH3808> Nor הָלַךְ֮ <WH1980> that walketh בַּעֲצַ֪ת <WH6098> not in the counsel רְשָׁ֫עִ֥ים <WH7563> of the ungodly וּבְדֶ֣רֶךְ <WH1870> in the way חַ֭טָּאִים <WH2400> of sinners לֹ֥א <WH3808> Nor עָמָ֑ד <WH5975> nor standeth וּבְמוֹשַׁ֥ב <WH4186> in the seat לֵ֝צִ֗ים <WH3887> of the scornful לֹ֣א <WH3808> Nor יָשָֽׁב׃ <WH3427> nor sitteth

כִּ֤י <WH3588> for אִ֥ם <WH518> lo בְּתוֹרַ֥ת <WH8451> [is] in the law יְהוָ֗ה <WH3069> God חֶ֫פְצ֥וֹ <WH2656> But his delight וּֽבְתוֹרָת֥וֹ <WH8451> and in his law יֶהְגֶּ֗ה <WH1897> doth he meditate יוֹמָ֥ם <WH3119> day וָלָֽיְלָה׃ <WH3915> and night

וְֽהָיָ֗ה <WH1961> will be like כְּעֵץ֮ <WH6086> And he shall be like a tree שָׁת֪וּל <WH8362> planted עַֽל־ <WH5921> by פַּלְגֵ֫י <WH6388> by the rivers מָ֥יִם <WH4325> of water אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> Which פִּרְי֨וֹ ׀ <WH6529> his fruit יִתֵּ֬ן <WH5414> that bringeth forth בְּעִתּ֗וֹ <WH6256> in his season וְעָלֵ֥הוּ <WH5929> his leaf לֹֽא־ <WH3808> does not יִבּ֑וֹל <WH5034> also shall not wither וְכֹ֖ל <WH3605> all manner אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> Which יַעֲשֶׂ֣ה <WH6213> and whatsoever he doeth יַצְלִֽיחַ׃ <WH6743> shall prosper

לֹא־ <WH3808> are not כֵ֥ן <WH3651> so הָרְשָׁעִ֑ים <WH7563> The ungodly כִּ֥י <WH3588> for אִם־ <WH518> but כַּ֝מֹּ֗ץ <WH4671> [are] not so but [are] like the chaff אֲ‍ֽשֶׁר־ <WH834> which תִּדְּפֶ֥נּוּ <WH5086> driveth away רֽוּחַ׃ <WH7307> which the wind

עַל־ <WH5921> and כֵּ֤ן ׀ <WH3651> after that לֹא־ <WH3808> Nor יָקֻ֣מוּ <WH6965> shall not stand רְ֭שָׁעִים <WH7563> Therefore the ungodly בַּמִּשְׁפָּ֑ט <WH4941> in the judgment וְ֝חַטָּאִ֗ים <WH2400> nor sinners בַּעֲדַ֥ת <WH5712> in the congregation צַדִּיקִֽים׃ <WH6662> of the righteous

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for יוֹדֵ֣עַ <WH3045> knoweth יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> For the LORD דֶּ֣רֶךְ <WH1870> the way צַדִּיקִ֑ים <WH6662> of the righteous וְדֶ֖רֶךְ <WH1870> but the way רְשָׁעִ֣ים <WH7563> of the ungodly תֹּאבֵֽד׃ <WH6> shall perish
